name: The Magic Theatre {for madmen only} 2019
description:
The title is inspired by Herman Hess’s’ Steppenwolfe The Magic Theatre {for madmen only} 2019
The piece originally was a book page I photographed in progress and painted over.
I animated it using Light Tricks and edited it with sound in Kinemaster.

Sound design by @fendelmarc
Instruments: Spitfire LABS, Elektron Model Samples, keyboards, samples
Recorded and Mixed in Seattle, Washington - August 2021

Anne Grgich is one of the most original and innovative artists in 
the group of American artists known as Outsiders. 
Completely self-taught and in Raw Vision Magazine Woman 
Issue #103 by Colin Rhodes. 

Twitter @annegrgich
